name: Data Models Documentation
description: Sequelize Data Models with decorators and lifecycle hooks
title: APIDoc - Data Models Example

header.title: Getting Started
header.content:
This documentation demonstrates the new @model parser for documenting Sequelize data models with automatic extraction.

Features:

  • Automatic extraction of attributes with decorators
  • Automatic extraction of relationships (BelongsTo, HasMany, etc.)
  • Automatic extraction of lifecycle hooks
  • Type inference support
